name: Fist Of Wrath (Brentacool)
description:
Fist of Warath is a top-down beat em up game where hitting with the right fist is fundamental. The game takes inspirtation from 80s' arcade machines, both aesthetically and machanically.

Move your avatar with WASD and use the mouse keys for the fists.

Defeat hordes of enemies and try to go as far as you can!
